store_info.description_short: LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice OpenOffice.
store_info.description_long: LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice.org (commonly known as OpenOffice). Its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity. This app uses Apache Guacamole to provide a remote desktop experience.
store_info.hint: This app uses Apache Guacamole to provide a remote desktop experience.
